title: EVOGREEN CITY
detail: Evogreen City offers a harmonious blend of modern living and natural tranquility. Choose from 1, 2, and 3 BHK residences that cater to a variety of lifestyles and needs. Each home is designed with a focus on comfort and sustainability, featuring spacious layouts and eco-friendly elements. Enjoy high-quality finishes, contemporary amenities, and thoughtfully planned spaces that seamlessly integrate with the surrounding environment. Evogreen City is where innovative living meets serene surroundings, providing an ideal setting for a balanced and fulfilling life.
developer_detail: Pune’s Orange County Group was established in 2005. It started off as a single building in Pashan and has, over time, grown into a brand that is known for green buildings and self-sustainable townships.In its endeavour towards creating a green future, the Orange County Group has consciously added to the environment and always used renewable energy in construction activities.
city_description: Dehu offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience. Embrace a vibrant community surrounded by lush greenery, historical landmarks, and modern amenities. Experience the charm of Dehu Road's bustling markets and seamless connectivity to Pune's urban hubs. Your peaceful haven awaits.
